name: Hold Me Bodysuit LS . Solid and Stripes
description: The perfect first layer for your baby. Styled with a dropped leg so it can be worn alone and still look adorable. Features our unique stretchy neck for tearless on and off, raglan sleeves, integrated mittens/thumbholes, underarm gusset and comfort flat stitching. Original price $28. Sale price $26. name: Snuggle Zip Footie Romper
description: Babies and children (up to 6 years) will feel snuggly warm in our organic zipper sleeper. Dressing is made super-easy with the front neck to knee zipper while flat-lock seams and protective inside zipper flap leaves nothing to bind or pinch tender skin. Fold over mittens for hands and feet keep little fingers and toes warm throughout the winter.
